properties.areaDesc: Waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR from 10 to 60 nm; Coastal waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 21 at 4:58AM PST until January 22 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Hazardous Seas Warning, very steep and hazardous
seas 16 to 19 ft at 16 seconds. For the Small Craft Advisory,
south winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and seas 14 to 16
ft at 16 seconds expected. For the Gale Watch, south winds 25 to
35 kt with gusts up to 40 kt and seas 12 to 15 ft at 13 seconds
possible.

* WHERE...All areas.

* WHEN...For the Hazardous Seas Warning, until 10 PM PST this
evening. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 10 PM this evening
to 10 AM PST Wednesday. For the Gale Watch, from Wednesday
morning through Wednesday evening.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds and very steep seas could capsize or
damage vessels. Low visibility conditions are expected.


* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid strong winds and
very steep seas. Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course,
and/or secure the vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING
